channel.title: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?
channel.description:
Seriously. Look at this - [url]https://topsites.moddb.com/all/?game=61[/url]
Number THIRTY FIVE. That must be wrong. I don't see how this mod could be not #1.

item.title: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I doubt anyone will think it sucks monkey balls. To be honest there has been plenty enough love just by seeing the media. I am not saying there wont be issues or concerns or preferences that folks wont agree with, I am just saying that I predict the overall feeling for Black Mesa will be a lot of love and tenderness.

Read full topic
item.source: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?

The only thing I fear more than BMS never coming out is that it comes out, and sucks monkey balls.

But that won’t happen.
…right?

nah, it’s quite okay :meh:

item.title: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?

item.description:
Danny Smith please GTFO the internetz.

And I really do hope that this mod will live up to its name and rise to #1. The only thing I fear more than BMS never coming out is that it comes out, and sucks monkey balls.

But that won’t happen.

…right?

item.title: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Yeah, they couldn’t hire EVERY great mod-maker. But they hired one of the BEST. The mapping in Minerva, not just the aesthetics (which were all stock HL2), but the method. You get a hell of a lotta gameplay outta those five maps. They hired him partly due to his efficient use of the Source engine, with vertical maps and such.

Read full topic
item.source: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?

item.title: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Collision:

You’d think so, but you’d be wrong.

Yeah, except I’m not. Minerva was alright, but then Valve realized that more than one person could mod Source, and they couldn’t hire every great mod-maker. >.<

Sarcasm aside, just look at up and coming mods like Black Mesa, Raindrop, and even City 17 is looking pretty cool right now.

Read full topic

item.source: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?

item.title: How is BM:S not #1 on ModDB?
item.dc:creator: Tree-line
item.description:
mouserider:

oh, for cryin’ out loud.

Black Mesa is THE most ambitious non-profit mod this world has EVER seen and will EVER see.

the half-life community should kiss the dev team’s feet for doing this.

i’d be surprised not only if it didn’t be the #1 mod in the world, but if the BM dev team wouldn’t get any special attention from other developers like job offerings and stuff like that. it could happen. and they’d deserve it.

now if you allow me, i’d like to take this opportunity to take off my hat and thank them for doing this.

:takesoffhatandmakesweirdsoundstowardsthesky:

Smell good way up in the devs’ asses?

Read full topic
